```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(BiocStyle)
library(hmmertools)
```

# Introduction

hmmertools enables to run hmmer from R using a docker image.

```{r}
seq <- system.file("inst", "files", "uniprot.fasta", package = "hmmertools")
hmm <- system.file("inst", "files", "Ras.hmm", package = "hmmertools")

h <- hmmertools::hmmer$new()
h$hmmsearch(args = "-h")
```
